Name: Triton Wing
About the game: Triton Wing is an open-world, top-down, 2D shooter set in a large space environment. Influenced by arcade shoot-em-ups of the past, Triton Wing adds free-roaming and RPG-like features. Fight in space and on-planet to liberate the galaxy. Use a combination of powerful weapons to fight a large variety of enemy ships. A nice sound track and lots of explosions and effects punctuate the arcade-style feel. FEATURES: Large space environment including 16 planet maps to explore Customizable weapon load-out Can purchase new ships with improved stats Ships are infinitely upgradable Warp mode to travel large distances quickly Cool soundtrack
